levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Thoracalgia​</line-height>
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] ได้รับ (highest Reson.) [Breath] (max 4)
- เมื่อมี 15+ [Breath], ได้รับ แต้มรวม +(highest Reson.) instead (max 4)
[BeforeAttack] ได้รับ (highest Reson. / 2) [Breath] Count (max 2)
- เมื่อมี 5+ [Breath] Count, ได้รับ แต้มเหรียญ +(highest Reson. / 2) instead (max 2)
[TargetKill] ได้รับ 1 [HoldingBreath] ในเทิร์นหน้า (2 times per turn)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] ได้รับ 2 [HoldingBreath] (once per turn)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Thoracalgia​</line-height>
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, ทำ  +30% more ความเสียหาย

[BeforeAttack] เมื่อมี less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to ได้รับ 5 [Breath] และ +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, ได้รับ 2 [HoldingBreath] ในเทิร์นหน้า. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the followingเป็นwell:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies ได้รับ 2 [Breath] และ +2 [Breath] Count

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] ได้รับ 4 [HoldingBreath] (once per turn)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Thoracalgia​</line-height>
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, ทำ  +30% more ความเสียหาย

[BeforeAttack] เมื่อมี less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to ได้รับ 5 [Breath] และ +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
<style="highlight">- ได้รับ 1 [Breath] for every ally targeted ไป this Skill (max 2)</style>

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, ได้รับ 2 [HoldingBreath] ในเทิร์นหน้า. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the followingเป็นwell:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies ได้รับ <style="highlight">4</style> [Breath] และ +2 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">- Recover half of ค่าสติ used ไป this Skill</style>

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">ทำ +([Breath] Potency + Count)% more ความเสียหายบนCritical Hit (max 20%)</style>
[OnSucceedAttack] ได้รับ 4 [HoldingBreath] (once per turn)<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Thoracalgia​</line-height>
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day

- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
- ได้รับ <style="highlight">2</style> [Breath] for every ally targeted ไป this Skill (max <style="highlight">4</style>)

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, ได้รับ 3 [HoldingBreath] ในเทิร์นหน้า. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the followingเป็นwell:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies ได้รับ 4 [Breath] และ +<style="highlight">4</style> [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">- Recover ค่าสติ used ไป this Skill และ reได้รับ 1 of each E.G.O resources consumed</style>

coindescs.desc: ทำ +([Breath] Potency + Count)% more ความเสียหายบนCritical Hit (max <style="highlight">40%</style>)
[OnSucceedAttack] ได้รับ <style="highlight">7</style> [HoldingBreath] (once per turn)
